posts.post_content: I am interested in buying a Rose PC of any Yankee/Highlander.  Doesn't need to be high grade.  I am most interested in Harry Niles, Fred Glade or Jake Stahl. Thank you.
Hi Duncan - I have quite a few extra Rose postcards, but only one NY AL player - Chesbro. LMK if you want me to send scans to you. The price is $1,500. Best, Kevin
